11#ifndef RTC_BASE_NUMERICS_MOD_OPS_H_
12#define RTC_BASE_NUMERICS_MOD_OPS_H_
13
14#include <algorithm>
15#include <type_traits>
16
17#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
18
19namespace webrtc {
20
21template <unsigned long M> // NOLINT
22inline unsigned long Add(unsigned long a, unsigned long b) { // NOLINT
23 RTC_DCHECK_LT(a, M);
24 unsigned long t = M - b % M; // NOLINT
25 unsigned long res = a - t; // NOLINT
26 if (t > a)
27 return res + M;
28 return res;
29}
30
31template <unsigned long M> // NOLINT
32inline unsigned long Subtract(unsigned long a, unsigned long b) { // NOLINT
33 RTC_DCHECK_LT(a, M);
34 unsigned long sub = b % M; // NOLINT
35 if (a < sub)
36 return M - (sub - a);
37 return a - sub;
38}
39
40// Calculates the forward difference between two wrapping numbers.
41//
42// Example:
43// uint8_t x = 253;
44// uint8_t y = 2;
45//
46// ForwardDiff(x, y) == 5
47//
48// 252 253 254 255 0 1 2 3
49// #################################################
50// | | x | | | | | y | |
51// #################################################
52// |----->----->----->----->----->
53//
54// ForwardDiff(y, x) == 251
55//
56// 252 253 254 255 0 1 2 3
57// #################################################
58// | | x | | | | | y | |
59// #################################################
60// -->-----> |----->---
61//
62// If M > 0 then wrapping occurs at M, if M == 0 then wrapping occurs at the
63// largest value representable by T.
64template <typename T, T M>
65inline typename std::enable_if<(M > 0), T>::type ForwardDiff(T a, T b) {
66 static_assert(std::is_unsigned<T>::value,
67 "Type must be an unsigned integer.");
68 RTC_DCHECK_LT(a, M);
69 RTC_DCHECK_LT(b, M);
70 return a <= b ? b - a : M - (a - b);
71}
72
73template <typename T, T M>
74inline typename std::enable_if<(M == 0), T>::type ForwardDiff(T a, T b) {
75 static_assert(std::is_unsigned<T>::value,
76 "Type must be an unsigned integer.");
77 return b - a;
78}
79
80template <typename T>
81inline T ForwardDiff(T a, T b) {
82 return ForwardDiff<T, 0>(a, b);
83}
84
85// Calculates the reverse difference between two wrapping numbers.
86//
87// Example:
88// uint8_t x = 253;
89// uint8_t y = 2;
90//
91// ReverseDiff(y, x) == 5
92//
93// 252 253 254 255 0 1 2 3
94// #################################################
95// | | x | | | | | y | |
96// #################################################
97// <-----<-----<-----<-----<-----|
98//
99// ReverseDiff(x, y) == 251
100//
101// 252 253 254 255 0 1 2 3
102// #################################################
103// | | x | | | | | y | |
104// #################################################
105// ---<-----| |<-----<--
106//
107// If M > 0 then wrapping occurs at M, if M == 0 then wrapping occurs at the
108// largest value representable by T.
109template <typename T, T M>
110inline typename std::enable_if<(M > 0), T>::type ReverseDiff(T a, T b) {
111 static_assert(std::is_unsigned<T>::value,
112 "Type must be an unsigned integer.");
113 RTC_DCHECK_LT(a, M);
114 RTC_DCHECK_LT(b, M);
115 return b <= a ? a - b : M - (b - a);
116}
117
118template <typename T, T M>
119inline typename std::enable_if<(M == 0), T>::type ReverseDiff(T a, T b) {
120 static_assert(std::is_unsigned<T>::value,
121 "Type must be an unsigned integer.");
122 return a - b;
123}
124
125template <typename T>
126inline T ReverseDiff(T a, T b) {
127 return ReverseDiff<T, 0>(a, b);
128}
129
130// Calculates the minimum distance between to wrapping numbers.
131//
132// The minimum distance is defined as min(ForwardDiff(a, b), ReverseDiff(a, b))
133template <typename T, T M = 0>
134inline T MinDiff(T a, T b) {
135 static_assert(std::is_unsigned<T>::value,
136 "Type must be an unsigned integer.");
137 return std::min(ForwardDiff<T, M>(a, b), ReverseDiff<T, M>(a, b));
138}
139
140} // namespace webrtc
141
142#endif // RTC_BASE_NUMERICS_MOD_OPS_H_
143
